item.title: Can Insync dethrone Dropbox as a cloud storage service?
item.description: A couple of weeks ago I read a Techcrunch article about Insync. It is a service that works almost identically to Dropbox. Their differentiating feature is the fact that they use your Google Docs account for storage. A downside to this is that you only have 1GB of storage with â€¦
item.dc:creator: mr.rcollins
